info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nolan County through 100 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wastella, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Roscoe around 1240 AM CDT. Champion around 100 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include The Intersection Of Ranch Road 608 And Highway 147. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 230 and 240. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
